extends junit.framework.TestCase

      • setCdxLines

        protected void setCdxLines(String... lines)
        Set CDX lines TestCDXServer stub returns. Lines are parsed with CDXFieldConstants.CDX_ALL_NAMES. Note EmbeddedCDXServerIndex.query(org.archive.wayback.core.WaybackRequest) will throw ResourceNotInArchiveException if lines is empty.
        Parameters:
        lines - text CDX lines

      • testQuery

        public void testQuery()
               throws Exception
        capture search. basic options.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • testRevisitResolution

        public void testRevisitResolution()
                           throws Exception
        EmbeddedCDXServerIndex resolves revisits for replay requests. (This is actually a test of CDXToCaptureSearchResultsWriter.)
        Throws:
        Exception

      • testRevisitResolutionReverse

        public void testRevisitResolutionReverse()
                                  throws Exception
        CDXToCaptureSearchResultsWriter resolves revisits for replay requests (reverse order input mode) (Test of CDXToCaptureSearchResultsWriter.)

        Since there's no way to put CDXToCaptureSearchResultsWriter's in reverse mode, this test calls CDXToCaptureSearchResultWriter directly.

        In other words, its reverse mode is never used in practice.

        Throws:
        Exception

      • testSoftBlock

        public void testSoftBlock()
                   throws Exception
        Test of soft-block feature (regular replay). capture with "X" in robotflags field does not make its way into CaptureSearchResults, but still available as payload capture for revisits.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • testSoftBlock_fieldModificationRecognized

        public void testSoftBlock_fieldModificationRecognized()
                                               throws Exception
        Supplementary test for soft-block feature. Modification to robotflags made by exclusionFilter must be properly recognized. As baseline EmbeddedCDXServerIndex does not have setting up exclusionFilter, this test deals with CDXToCaptureSearchResultsWriter directly.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • testSoftBlock_revisitPayloadLookup

        public void testSoftBlock_revisitPayloadLookup()
                                        throws Exception
        Test of soft-block feature (URL-agnostic revisit payload lookup). In revisit payload lookup mode, capture with "X" is returned.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • testBuildStatusFilter

        public void testBuildStatusFilter()
        quick test of EmbeddedCDXServerIndex.buildStatusFilter(String)

        test of EmbeddedCDXServerIndex.setBaseStatusRegexp(String)
        Throws:

      • testIgnoreRobotPaths

        public void testIgnoreRobotPaths()
                          throws Exception
        for those SURT prefixes in ignoreRobotsPaths, AuthToken.isIgnoreRobots() flag is set.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • testCollapseTime

        public void testCollapseTime()
                      throws Exception
        test of timestamp-collapsing.

        Actual processing happens in CDXServer. EmbeddedCDXServerIndex simply passes WaybackRequest.getCollapseTime() to CDXQuery.setCollapse(String[]). if collapseTime is unspecified in WaybackRequest (-1), default value timestampDedupLength will be used.

        Throws:
        Exception

      • testHandleRequest

        public void testHandleRequest()
                       throws Exception
        EmbeddedCDXServerIndex.handleRequest(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) is a entry point for CDXServer API. It should return all accessible cdx lines, without applying any additional filters not requested by API user.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • testRenderMementoTimemap

        public void testRenderMementoTimemap()
                              throws Exception
        EmbeddedCDXServerIndex.renderMementoTimemap(WaybackRequest, HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) is a CDXServer API entry point for Memento format output.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • testIgnoreRobotsForEmbeds

        public void testIgnoreRobotsForEmbeds()
                               throws Exception
        robots.txt exclusion shall be disable for embeds.

        TODO: This is actually testing classes in wayback-cdx-server module. Implemented here because it takes more work to do this in wayback-cdx-server module, and it makes little sense to do it before planned refactoring.

        Ref: WWM-119. A bug in PrivTokenAuthChecker.

        Throws:
        Exception
